title: How to Make Fairy Banana Sandwiches

steps.headline: Mix the mashed banana with the honey, cinnamon and sultanas.
Spread on a slice of bread.
Add the other slice and cut into quarters to serve.

text: Mash the banana.  Mix the mashed banana with the honey, cinnamon and sultanas.  Spread on a slice of bread.  Add the other slice and cut into quarters to serve.
